website_summaries.verdict: A reliable case with a good amount of room for games and controllers.
pros: This inexpensive bag fits any PlayStation 4 model and has enough room for 2 controllers, cables, and plenty of games
A straightforward option that is best suited for storage and short trips
cons: The bag doesn't offer much protection and lacks durability
Some customers had trouble fitting the PS4 Pro

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more for a lot more
customer_reviews.text: You do get a canvas bag that fits the PS4 and a couple controllers. You do not get any protection for your investment. The reviews I read were all pretty good, but the product is lackluster. It arrived and an enormous box and I wasn’t sure if I had ordered a bag or an old tube tv. The actually carrier only took up about 1/16 of the box and unfolded easily. It’s merely a canvas bag with nothing that i would describe as padding. The shoulder strap is not comfortable and the only protection this will offer your console is from incidental abrasions during travel. I think you should get a different item.
customer_reviews.author: Tank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this PS4 carrying case. He uses it to travel with his PS4. Cannot leave Fortnite behind!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Taccone

customer_reviews.title: Holds my PS4 Pro - Can't Complain!
customer_reviews.text: Holds my PS4 Pro. It only fits in one way though - the slanted side needs to go in first. Still, I'm pretty happy with this. I don't transport the Pro that often, but now I have something to make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very misleading description.
customer_reviews.text: -Less than 8th inch of padding, nearly none in places -will not fit PS4 AND games, you have to choose PS4 OR games -no mesh pocket for AC adapter -Controller pocket not large enough to hold PS4 controler without crushing joysticks and R2 L2 triggers -zipper broke on first zip, other zipper seems as though it may only last for 3 or 4 zips. -shotty stitching and sewing Similar to the canvas bags that credit card companies hand out for free if you apply for a credit card, or possibly like the ones your work gives away at company picnics but nobody likes to use it because it has the company name printed on it on too big.
customer_reviews.author: roy choate

customer_reviews.title: Great ps4 bag
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great ps4 bag for the price is amazing fits 6 games cases, all the cables and two controllers plus the console I really recomend it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazom

customer_reviews.title: This bag felt like nothing was in there
customer_reviews.text: We used this bag for our trip out of time. This bag felt like nothing was in there. It went through airport security so easily and I feel had sufficient padding. It fit the entire system with power cords, both controllers, and 4 games inside their cases. This was a great investment and would highly recommended for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The bag serves its purpose but lacks a bit in space. The PS4 pro is a tight fit in the bag, I was worried about the corners being dinged of it hit anything. There’s barely enough room for the controllers and cables. If you want to pack a headset, forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Z.

customer_reviews.title: Slim-fit with Good Protection
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. It fits my controller, a few games, all my cords, and my PlayStation. It’s slim-fit, so headphones that can’t flatten down won’t fit, but it have ample protection for the console and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to travel
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my boy. He carries his ps4, wires, controller and a game or two with him. (Small headphones could easily fit but he has an obnoxious size pair) great quality and easy to carry/pack.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: is able to hold the console and all cords including a controller, headset, and hard drive without crushing them. The strap is also comfortable and adjustable so it’s easy to carry. doesn’t feel cheaply made and feels like it will be able to hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed in the product. It really looks like a laptop bag. It is not what I was expecting. I was hoping this would be a good Christmas gift but instead of looks like something I can stick my dirty laundry a.m.
customer_reviews.author: Roxx Wallington

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my son's PlayStation! Wish it had a little more room for accessories, but overall a solid, inexpensive option!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: More carry, less protection
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great carry case for system, power cable, one game, and one controller. Not much “protection”
customer_reviews.author: Skabarbro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this bag is horrible but otherwise fits great
customer_reviews.author: Jmo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case
customer_reviews.text: Great case for travel. It doesn't have to be fancy but its really good quailty.
customer_reviews.author: JayFoxFire

customer_reviews.title: Teen Approved
customer_reviews.text: Teen says he uses it for all kinds of electronics too.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Ps4 Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very well pleased with this ps4 bag, pockets on outside and inside. Well put together !!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnti Wells

customer_reviews.title: Bag is smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how it held the game as well as the controllers. A little small to carry games, but I was able to fit a couple in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: R. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this for an original PS4. It’s not big enough.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work well with an original PS4 as advertised. It would probably be great for a PS4 slim.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Aweful
customer_reviews.text: It is tiny! It is no where near the size advertised, my system doesn’t even fit inside it! Terrible quality, it would probably fall apart in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: Not very protective; just a bag.
customer_reviews.text: Pro- the PS4 fits in it. Pro- small enough to be a personal item on a plane. Con- it offers no real benefit like protection for the PS4. Nothing happened to my PS4 but I would have been fine just packing it in my carry-on.
customer_reviews.author: Burl Henry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the PS4
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my lil bro's PS4 an he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect gift for a child who loves to play games!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandson and the zipper on the smaller compartment broke.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Marie Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit a PS4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good case but unfortunately doesn’t fit PS4 PRO ...
customer_reviews.author: ADRIANA

customer_reviews.title: Package stolen and that sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my package was stolen. So I’m going to order another one next week but if I had it, I’d give it 5 stars because it’s what I wanted. I don’t know if the USPS followed my directions of where to place it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Should be cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product with high expectations reading all the good reviews but when product arrived it was a complete disappointment hardly much room as shown could barely fit controller and cables let alone a few games. The main space for the system is barely padded for protecting the system.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Duran

customer_reviews.title: But it’s a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were a bit bigger to hold more games. But it’s a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: hector knox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the PS4. Strong material. Holds everything you need to take a on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for grandson’s PS4. He’s really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: karen a zoe

customer_reviews.title: Carrying strap way to small.
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the fact that the handle and carrying strap is extremely small. Protects the system and you can add only 4 games, one controller, and cords inside. Along with the ps4 system.
customer_reviews.author: Brett N.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag & recommend all to purchase
customer_reviews.text: This bag works perfectly for my PS4, cords, & controllers. It's also worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Quality PS4 case!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality PS4 case, does everything I need it to and store 2 controllers and all of the cords! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Shook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I needed something other than a cardboard box to carry my PS4 in and I'm very pleased. Only thing I would change is the amount of storage available for more games and controllers
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Great case, tight fit but perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The case is small, but everything fits perfectly. This is exactly what I needed. I didn’t transport any games but probably could do one or two if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the a glove. Feels good it packs in very well. 5 star bby!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great product arrived fast.
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it was sent quickly. Fits a PS4 perfectly. No flaws or defects. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Day

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect. Although there is just one minor issue
customer_reviews.text: All the ps4 stuff fit everything inside the bag. It's perfect. Although there is just one minor issue: The strap that holds the ps4 controller is kinda tight.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Ericson Jaurigue

customer_reviews.title: Thin material, but works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, feels a bit thinner than I would have liked though
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag it's sturdy an holds all my PlayStation needs for travel
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My PS4 slim fits perfectly in this bag! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Not for PS4 pro
customer_reviews.text: Really tight fit for PS4 pro struggle to zip it up feels like it's gonna break the zipper soon
customer_reviews.author: Michael Qualls

customer_reviews.title: ps4 Pro will not fit
customer_reviews.text: i loved the idea and convenience but my PS4 PRO will not fit inside to zip up.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean1047

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Case works and all but is not what was shown in pictures so yeah
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Barely fits a Playstation console...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend for him to transport his PlayStation 4 more easily. It is incredibly small and barely fits the console. There is room for MAYBE 2 games. But no room for anything else such as controllers or cords. We will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: chellybean48

customer_reviews.title: My Xbox fits in it better than my PS4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: Expected a little bit more space. My Xbox fits in it better than my PS4 Pro. The second pocket for controllers shows two controllers and cables in it comfortably strapped in but I was only able to fit 1 controller with cables in nicely without over packing it. For the price, it does what it needs to however do not expect any type of cushion for protection. It's strictly a transportation bag to carry things.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive this case. I got two xl men's shirts instead, don't buy this case.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Furlani

customer_reviews.title: Great to travel with.
customer_reviews.text: Good case for PS4 1TB when you have to travel with it. Makes carrying it convenient Shoulder straps and enough space in bag to house 2 controllers and cables.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

product_meta.title: New Travel Storage Carry Case Protective Shoulder Bag Handbag for PlayStation PS4, PS4 Pro and PS4 Slim System Console Carrying Bag and Accessories #81050 (black-large)
product_meta.description:
Color:black-largeTake your PS4 System, games and accessories with you. Keep them organized and protected with for PlayStation4 System case. It holds your PS4 system, games, controllers and accessories.

Features:
Designed for PlayStation PS4, PS4 Pro, PS4 Slim . 
Adjustablet shoulder strap, can be used as a shoulder bag or handbag 
The main compartment to hold the console 
Protects your device from dust, scratch and shock 
Convenient for you to carry your game device for travel 
Wear-resistant and durable oxford fabric 
The bag only, other devices are not included. 

Specifications:
Condition: 100% Brand New
Material: 600D oxford fabric
Main Color: Black
Size: 32 x 13 x 31 cm
Large size: 37 x 17 x 33.5 cm
Fit: for PS4, PS4 Slim 

Package Includes:
1 x Travel Bag Carrying Case for PS4
feature_bullets: Main pocket holds and protects for PS4, PS4 Slim and PS4 Pro Systems.
Convenient mesh inside pockets for games.
Fully padded case for maximum protection,when you put your game console and accessory in the bag, pls dont Forced to dump the bag.
Front pocket holds 2 DualShock 4 wireless controllers, for PlayStation Camera, AC Power cord, HDMI and USB cables
Adjustable shoulder strap and convenient carrying handle. Outer size: 37 x 17 x 33.5 cm.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
